message: I propose dividing the money with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair share while acknowledging the potential risk of inflation.
I'll take a smaller share now to hedge against future inflation, but still want a significant portion of the initial amount.
Considering the impact of inflation, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This maintains a reasonable balance while accounting for the diminishing value of money over time.
I'm willing to take a very small share now, but I want to ensure I get a significant portion of the remaining value, considering the inflation is eating away at our potential earnings.
